RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 330 Y Dirt CR: 72. Maiden Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. non starters preferred.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COPY OF JESS held well, driving. DARK IVORY COAST veered in start. RC A FLASHN SURVIVOR in close, couldn't gain. SHEZA BODACIOUS BABE stumbled start. JM SPECIAL HEART broke in. SOUTHERN BELL came out start. ZEE QUEEN broke out. LOCA DE GATA hard to load, drifted. PATRIOTS MOONFLASH clear path, no bid. JET FOOSE PATRIOT crowded, pushed in start.

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Ivory Coast
ENTRY.OWNER: Abraham, Mike and Schoenhofer, Denis and Julie

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOR F&M THAT HAVE RUN AT THE RUIDOSO 2023 MEET AND HAVE NOT FINISHED 1ST, 2ND OR 3RD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIZ FOR REAL stalked the pace four wide, challenged for the lead on the turn, inched clear and held under urging. ZIPPIN BY U broke slowly and was crowded at the start, was allowed to settle and raced in the back, angled out on the turn, bid five wide, closed steadily and gained late. DESERTROSE OFTEXAS broke out, vied inside to the turn, fell back, went evenly late and held for show. TIZ MY HOUR came out at the start, vied three across to the turn, fell back and weakened. INDIAN DIVA was away alertly, vied between horses to the turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Desertrose Oftexas
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, vied inside to turn, fell back, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz My Hour
ENTRY.OWNER: Crowell Robert Van and Markey J Kyle
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out start, vied 3across to turn, fell back, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Zippin by U
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,crowded,angled out turn, 5w bid, steady close, late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz for Real
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4w, challenged turn, took over, inched away, under urging

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied between horses to turn, stopped,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 3 550 Y Dirt CR: 84. Maiden Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JD ZOOM ZOOM ZOOM dueled, best. MR CINCH broke sharply, came out, vied, outfinished, gamely. KBAR TALK ABOUT RUN drifted in, veered out, vied, not enough. MAX TRACK off a step slowly, bumped both sides. WAKE N BAKE clear path, no rally. EYE AM THE ONE broke in, bumped. BROOKSTONE SURFER broke awkwardly, bumped. PROPHETIC EFFORT came out start.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Cinch
ENTRY.OWNER: Ford Richard E and Sorenson Fred
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, came out, vied, outfinished, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Max Track
ENTRY.COMMENT: off a step slowly, bumped both sides

ENTRY.NAME: Eye Am the One
ENTRY.OWNER: Petrocasa, LLC. and Henderson, Samuel F.

ENTRY.NAME: Wake N Bake
ENTRY.OWNER: Crawford Cody Rea and Wilson Renee K

ENTRY.NAME: Kbar Talk About Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in, veered out, vied, not enough

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 4 350 Y Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 19000. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TARY fractious gate, held well. OKEYSPECIALDADDY bumped mid stretch. CASH THE TICKET broke in, steady bid. EL MONO PLAY BOY fractious gate, close throughout. FREEDOM RIDER drifted in, steady close. MERLENE bumped start. R K SLATER broke in, bumped. GRACIE LOO broke out, came out mid stretch, bumped. BIG DADDY FARR stumbled, bumped, crowded.

ENTRY.NAME: Gracie Loo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, came out mid stretch, bumped

ENTRY.NAME: R K Slater
ENTRY.OWNER: Davies Brad Williams Brad Wooten Terry and Barton Jimmy

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 11600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERPICO R S S was away alertly, vied two across to the turn, drew off and extended the lead under mild urging. F J COLIMA came out at the start, vied inside to the turn, fell back and was no match for the winner. ROLL TO RICHES bumped at the start, was in tight at the gap, raced close to pace towards the outside, swung wide entering the stretch and was along for show. MOONLIT FOREST was crowded at the start and at the gap, veered in to stalk inside, angled back out entering the turn and gave way. HUNKALICIOUS broke out and was off slowly, was taken outside and showed little. SMARTY'S BERTRANDO hopped and bumped at the start, raced in the back and showed little in an even effort. EL ZARAPE was crowded at the gap, showed speed to the turn, stopped, was eased and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: F J Colima
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out start, vied inside, fell back turn, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Moonlit Forest
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded start, gap, veered in, angled out into turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: El Zarape
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded gap, speed to turn, stopped, eased, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Hunkalicious
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, off slowly, taken wide, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Roll to Riches
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, in tight gap, swung wide into stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Smarty's Bertrando
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, bumped start, in the back, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Serpico R S S
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied 2across to turn, drew off, mild urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 350 Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GBH KISS MY DIAMOND dueled, all out. KISS MY ROANA bobbled start, veered out, steady cclose. FIRST IVORY ROSE vied throughout. CHICKS CUTIE drifted in, outfinished. JESSIES FIRST MOON bumped start, in tight. SYLENCER broke in, bumped, in tight. ESCAPAYDZ in tight start, lost path. HOPE FOR A DYNASTY no mishap.

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss My Roana
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, veered out, steady cclose

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 18500. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIG RIDER was off a step slowly, was taken outside past the gap, rallied five wide on the turn, swung wide into the stretch, dueled for the lead and drew clear late. DECK HUMOR pressed the pace, bid between horses on the turn to challenge, dueled to late stretch and yielded to finish second best. BESITOS CRIMINALES set a pressured pace, fell back in the upper stretch and just lasted for show. DOS REALES pressed the pace, bid between horses on the turn, fell back, shifted out, continued willingly and was outnodded for third. HALF COURT SAM was slow early, raced inside, bid off the rail and finished well. STRYDER raced in the back towards the outside, was crowded past the gap, dropped in, angled back out to be widest in the drive and lacked a bid. CANYON DEL ORO broke in, raced close to the pace along the inside, bid along the rail on the turn, fell back, weakened and faded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Canyon Del Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, close to pace, bid rail turn, fell back, weakened,faded

ENTRY.NAME: Half Court Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, raced inside, bid off rail, finished well,

ENTRY.NAME: Besitos Criminales
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, fell back upper stretch, just lasted for show

ENTRY.NAME: Dos Reales
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid between turn, fell back, angled out, closed, outnodded show

ENTRY.NAME: Rig Rider
ENTRY.COMMENT: off a step slowl rallied 5w turn, swung wide, dueled, clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Deck Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid between horses turn, dueled, yielded, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Stryder
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced outside, crowded past gap, dropped in, widest drive, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 8 440 Y Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Purse 42900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE SWAMP under pressure, held on gamely. FREIGHTTRAIN STEW broke out, chased, couldn't gain. APOLITICAL THUNDER steady bid. EVERYTHINGYOUNEED brushed start. CALLED A DYNASTY brushed start. JUST CALL ME JESS drifted out. STONE COLD LEADER off a step slowly. FAVORITE WINNER came in start. WORK ETHIC no threat. BP VALIANT EAGLE outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Everythingyouneed
ENTRY.OWNER: Sedillo Tony E and Absolute Refrigeration

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 43600. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 26. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE MARK held a good position, made a quick move four wide on the turn, assumed command, drew off in the drive and was ridden out. STORM LEADER vied between horses to the turn, fell back and held for place while no threat to the winner. EVACUEE raced mid pack along the inside, angled out on the turn, bid six wide and finished well to earn show. LEAVE THEM BEHIND vied three across to the turn, fell back and finished evenly. IZERIGHT was void of early speed, dropped inside past the gap and was outrun in an even effort. LONZO WHO vied inside to the turn, fell back and faltered near the sixteenth pole. STORM BAYOU broke out and failed to contend. STORMIN FAST lagged while racing outside, went six wide leaving the turn and lacked a response.

ENTRY.NAME: Lonzo Who
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside to turn, fell back, faltered 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Leader
ENTRY.OWNER: Abraham Mike and Amestoy Leslie and Amestoy Jr Pierre J
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses to turn, fell back, held for place

ENTRY.NAME: Leave Them Behind
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3across to turn, fell back, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Evacuee
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, angled out turn, 6wide bid, finished well, up 3d

ENTRY.NAME: Stormin Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged outside, 6wide leaving turn, lacked a response

ENTRY.NAME: One Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick move 4wide turn, assumed command, drew off, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Izeright
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, dropped inside past gap, evenly, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, failed to contend, outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 10 350 Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POLITIKO bumped start, bore out, held. AJ GOLD HEART steady close, outfinished. HOLY MITOLE close throughout, carried out late, outnodded 2nd. PRODIGIUM veered in start. BP CARTEL POLICY broke in air. TRES A HEART bumped near wire. ITS MY FAVORITE broke in air, bumped near wire. FULL MOON DELUXE no mishap. EAGLES DIVA broke in, bumped. BABY BOGART bumped, squeezed start.

ENTRY.NAME: Prodigium
ENTRY.OWNER: Empire Racing and Pavon Racing LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Mitole
ENTRY.OWNER: J and SM Inc Hudson Christine and Hudson Ben L
ENTRY.COMMENT: close throughout, carried out late, outnodded 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Full Moon Deluxe
ENTRY.OWNER: Cox Johnny Lee and Cox Keli

ENTRY.NAME: Its My Favorite
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, bumped near wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 11 350 Y Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST TIME FOR WINE steady close, in time. CHIMERA came out start, bled, vanned off. WOMAN IN GOLD vied, outfinished, gamely. ONE SECRET SISTER came in start. THE HUERFANITA bumped start. SURFERS NIGHTMARE off a step slowly, piched back. PRINCESS IZZY BUSY broke awkwardly, off very slow. SUNRISE RUBY bumped start. KVN DISCO broke awkwardly, off very slowly.

ENTRY.NAME: Kvn Disco
ENTRY.OWNER: Belloc Umberto and Quintanar Jorge Alberto

ENTRY.NAME: Chimera
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out start, bled, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Surfers Nightmare
ENTRY.COMMENT: off a step slowly, piched back

ENTRY.NAME: The Huerfanita
ENTRY.OWNER: Fuentes Alfonso Ivan and Escobar Francisco Andres
